mapper.select: SELECT subquery.*, d.department_name, p.position_name, u.user_profile_picture, u.user_name FROM ( SELECT * FROM board_comment WHERE board_num = #{board_num} ORDER BY comm_regdate DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{end} ) AS subquery JOIN user u ON subquery.user_num = u.user_num JOIN user_departments d ON u.department_id = d.department_id JOIN user_positions p ON u.position_id = p.position_id
mapper.insert: insert into board_comment(user_num, comm_content, board_num) values(#{userNum}, #{commContent}, #{boardNum})
